verses.verse: Praise <WH1984> you the Lord <WH3050>. Praise <WH1984> you the name <WH8034> of the Lord <WH3068>; praise <WH1984> him <WH5650>, O you servants of the Lord <WH3068>.
You that stand <WH5975> in the house <WH1004> of the Lord <WH3068>, in the courts <WH2691> of the house <WH1004> of our God <WH430>,
Praise <WH1984> the Lord <WH3050>; for the Lord <WH3068> is good <WH2896>: sing praises <WH2167> unto his name <WH8034>; for it is pleasant <WH5273>.
For the Lord <WH3050> has chosen <WH977> Jacob <WH3290> unto himself <WH3478>, and Israel for his peculiar treasure <WH5459>.
For I know <WH3045> that the Lord <WH3068> is great <WH1419>, and that our Lord <WH113> is above all gods <WH430>.
Whatever the Lord <WH3068> pleased <WH2654>, that did <WH6213> he in heaven <WH8064>, and in earth <WH776>, in the seas <WH3220>, and all deep places <WH8415>.

He causes the vapors <WH5387> to ascend <WH5927> from the ends <WH7097> of the earth <WH776>; he makes <WH6213> lightnings <WH1300> for the rain <WH4306>; he brings <WH3318> the wind <WH7307> out of his treasuries <WH214>.
Who struck <WH5221> the firstborn <WH1060> of Egypt <WH4714>, both of man <WH120> and animal <WH929>.
Who sent <WH7971> signs <WH226> and wonders <WH4159> into the middle <WH8432> of you <WH4714>, O Egypt, upon Pharaoh <WH6547>, and upon all his servants <WH5650>.
Who struck <WH5221> great <WH7227> nations <WH1471>, and killed <WH2026> mighty <WH6099> kings <WH4428>;
Sihon <WH5511> king <WH4428> of the Amorites <WH567>, and Og <WH5747> king <WH4428> of Bashan <WH1316>, and all the kingdoms <WH4467> of Canaan <WH3667>:
And gave <WH5414> their land <WH776> for a heritage <WH5159>, a heritage <WH5159> unto Israel <WH3478> his people <WH5971>.
Your name <WH8034>, O Lord <WH3068>, endures for ever <WH5769>; and your memorial <WH2143>, O Lord <WH3068>, throughout all <WH1755> generations <WH1755>.
For the Lord <WH3068> will judge <WH1777> his people <WH5971>, and he will repent <WH5162> himself concerning his servants <WH5650>.
The idols <WH6091> of the heathen <WH1471> are silver <WH3701> and gold <WH2091>, the work <WH4639> of men <WH120>'s hands <WH3027>.
They have mouths <WH6310>, but they speak <WH1696> not <WH5869>; eyes have they <WH7200>, but they see not;
They have ears <WH241>, but they hear <WH238> not <WH3426>; neither is there any breath <WH7307> in their mouths <WH6310>.
They that make <WH6213> them are like unto them <WH982>: so is every one that trusts in them.
Bless <WH1288> the Lord <WH3068>, O house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>: bless <WH1288> the Lord <WH3068>, O house <WH1004> of Aaron <WH175>:
Bless <WH1288> the Lord <WH3068>, O house <WH1004> of Levi <WH3878>: you that fear <WH3373> the Lord <WH3068>, bless <WH1288> the Lord <WH3068>.
Blessed <WH1288> be the Lord <WH3068> out of Zion <WH6726>, which dwells <WH7931> at Jerusalem <WH3389>. Praise <WH1984> you the Lord <WH3050>.
